Ths r hw th clt rls xct th dts f th clt:

* Dscpl: Th dscpl hs n blty.  dscpl my bcm n pstl f th pstl ds.
* Zlt: Th plyr wh hs bn n th clt hrrchy th shrtst s th nly zlt. f thr s  zlt, t wll prfrm kllngs rthr thn th pstl.
